archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0656
archimate:Requirement.documentation: The Collections solution shall enable automated outbound communcations to Account Managers for their relevant accounts, driven out of the Collections strategy for Enterprise customers.

properties.value: Account Managers is Vofadone worker. Enterprise customers will not processed by automated collection solution. Notification about increased Enterprise customer risk should be send to Account Manager. Notification must not be send to customer

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
